definitions.definition: the process of dealing with or controlling things or people.
the responsibility for and control of a company or similar organization.
examples: the management of a great metropolitan newspaper
synonyms: operation "he's responsible for the management of the firm"

definitions.definition: the people in charge of running a company or organization, regarded collectively.
the treatment or control of diseases, injuries, or disorders, or the care of patients who suffer from them.
examples: the use of combination chemotherapy in the management of breast cancer
if there has been any management in the business, it has been concealed from me
